channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Seattle’s Pan Pacific Hotel to transform into 1 Hotel Seattle

item.title: Is the Voom internet on Royal Caribbean cruise ships really as fast as they say?
